1.0.name: wordpress/advanced-custom-fields-address-field-add-on
1.0.description:
This is an add-on for the Advanced Custom Fields WordPress plugin and will not provide any functionality to WordPress unless Advanced Custom Fields is installed and activated.

The address field provides the ability to enter an address by component (street, city, state, postal code, country, ...), enable or disable components, and change the layout of the entered address (on the post screen) and printed address ( get_value() api call).

Source Repository on GitHub

https://github.com/GCX/acf-address-field

Bugs or Suggestions

https://github.com/GCX/acf-address-field/issues
